pullRequest.body:
Included proofs that conjugation by a unit preserves the spectrum, and conjugation by a unitary preserves the spectrum.

---

GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

### PR summary [5e77d434f0](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/13729/commits/5e77d434f08269c1739514131ff2d11850bae9e2)

#### Import changes

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Star.Unitary | 506 | 922 | +416 (+82.21%) |
| Mathlib.Analysis.NormedSpace.Star.Basic | 1133 | 1140 | +7 (+0.62%) |

---

#### Declarations diff

`+ spectrum.unitary_conjugate`
`+ spectrum.unitary_conjugate'`
`+ spectrum.units_conjugate`
`+ spectrum.units_conjugate'`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9492355380/job/26159358026)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9492355380/job/26159357730)

Any reason for the name being the other way around for unitaries? (i.e. `unitary_conjugate` instead of `conjugate_unitary`)? I don't have a strong preference either way, but it would be nice to have the same order as for units.
I have no good reason at all, actually. I'll coordinate these. Thanks for pointing this out!

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat : added `spectrum.conjugate_units` results to `Algebra.Algebra.Spectrum`, and `spectrum.conjugate_unitary` results to `Algebra.Star.Unitary`.
